ygData.subject: RE: lookin pretty
ygData.msgSnippet: So far spend 200pp to get my smithing to 95.  I thot at least can make some easy banded liao, but spend my last few pp to make 2 banded gorgets (easiest banded
ygData.messageBody:
So far spend 200pp to get my smithing to 95. I thot at least can make some
easy banded liao, but spend my last few pp to make 2 banded gorgets
(easiest banded to make) yet both FAILED! *(%%$# Problem is, at skill
95, skewers no longer give me anymore skill, tat means I need to throw in
MORE money to start making banded stuffs to rise my skill! So far I'm
still making loss when I make banded gorget and sell back to npc, not to
considered the failure yet. The cheapest banded also cost me close to 2pp
to make, sigh.

Now I'm broke again, and have been staying at lvl 20 for a week (due to
camping for dirk and smithing). It will take me at least another week to
hard work b4 I can earn enuff money for the next round of smith training ;(

Ziltus

p/s: Met a barbarian shaman at bird island over weekend, his smithing is
104. He told me he spend 300pp so far, and the reason for spending so much
more is due to his low INT. For those who wanna take up smithing, better
create a new high INT char to do so instead of using the existing char (if
INT below 100), otherwise not only will u smith until vomit blood like me,
u will smith until u cry man! Heheh.


On Sunday, 18 July, 1999 2:13 AM, hans ng [SMTP:nahemah@...]
wrote:

> 3)if the jewel is enchanted it will say so rite.
> thanks......also zilt u a master yet ,cant wait to get those rock bottom
> priced branded esp now brewin is worth shit....
